name: Dino jump (Hishamthegamedev)
description:
Hello itch.io community! This game is inspired by doodle jump. In this game you are constantly jumping and you can only go left or right just jump on to the platforms and try not to die. The high score will automatically save in a .txt file. Dino charecters made by arks arks itch.io - Arks💢 - itch.io arks twitter - @ScissorMarks or  @ArksDigital thanks for playing. I wanted to add music but some people will have errors so no music :(.  It will be nice of you if you could donate atleast $0.99. (Also all of the images should be in the same folder as the exe file)

Note: Google will say that this file is unsafe but I promise you this is 100% safe. 

If someone has MAC OS please test this game and leave a feedback I want to know whether if this game is working in MAC.
